channel.title: OsirisPK Release - Sound System & Bounty Hunter || PK Server
channel.description:
For those who wants to start a Pk server I highly recommend using this (if you made the bad decision and go with PI), this has very stable combat the timers and such are pretty accurate (even though the code is garbage). I have added some basics e.g Combat sound system and maybe region sound system if i remember right, also this has bounty hunter with target assigning and so on.
[B]Full package download:[/B][url=https://mega.co.nz/#!W4RmgQ4L!7O_KbeUI1NFDhc84wrR6k2isiKuxswixoPZ4dY5sfBQ]https://mega.co.nz/#!W4RmgQ4L!7O_KbeUI1NFDhc84wrR6k2isiKuxswixoPZ4dY5sfBQ[/url]
*Bounty Hunter *Sound System *Better combat *etc.
[img]http://puu.sh/ctZ5r/452f0b1b65.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/ctZ3H/47bcc71666.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/ctZ2y/8d06b67ebd.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/ctZ0T/508e5be804.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/ctYWM/0d017ac2c5.jpg[/img] [img]http://puu.sh/ctYUN/d9714bb072.jpg[/img]
[B]Credits[/B] Fuzenseth Sanity Gabbe And everyone who has worked on this at some point.

item.title: OsirisPK Release - Sound System & Bounty Hunter || PK Server
item.dc:creator: @nathanz nathanz
item.description:
@nathanz wrote:

we're in beta stage Client developed by AFG- Error: nathan size mismatch in getnpcpos - pos:76 psize:71 Error: T2 - 65,81,73 - 71,3087,3502 - 0,0,14,0,1,118,-48,1,53,-48,62,-69,0,23,61 ,3,-18,16,1,-65,-16,68,43,7,18,-81,0,65,80,-116,-114,-80,0,3,8,-51,39,0,0,48,-11 5,12,-128,0,3,-1,-4,32,-128,0, Error: T2 - 65,81,73 - 31,3087,3502 - 8,-110,73,43,-49,-1,-48,32,-128,0,32,-128, 0,32,-128,0,32,-128,0,32,-128,0,32,-128,0,32,-128,0,32,-128,0, Exception in thread "Thread-3" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 5387 at EntityDef.method161(EntityDef.java:141) at client.drawMinimap(client.java:10413) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:8830) at client.processDrawing(client.java:9719) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:114) at client.run(client.java:5200) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
